The Best Blogs Ever

16 December 2013 by

Ok you got me these may not be the best blogs ever, however these are the blogs I’m obsessed with and read every post of.

For all the websites, I have grouped them by category and added their Alexa rank (as of 26th Nov 13) along side the site.

Tech

General

  • Lifehacker AUS
    • Alexa Rank: 14,003
  • Lifehacker USA
    • Alexa Rank: 504
  • The Buffer Blog
    • Alexa Rank: 1,526
  • IFTTT Blog
    • Alexa Rank: 5,464
  • Kinja: How I Work
    • Alexa Rank, not relevant as this is a tag from Kinja Blogs by Gawker

Web development

  • Codrops
    • Alexa Rank: 1,403 Note: rank for the entire site tympanus.net
  • CSS Tricks
    • Alexa Rank: 1,051
  • Smashing Magazine
    • Alexa Rank: 944
  • David Walsh
    • Alexa Rank: 4,526
  • Lea Verou
    • Alexa Rank: 54,903

    • Alexa Rank: 7,992

    • Alexa Rank: 2,733

Humour
